reviews.review:
[i][h1]Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia. Revolucionó el género de los shooters en primera persona. Es un must-have.[/h1][/i]
[h1]Me gusta[/h1]

- El arsenal de armas del que dispondrás al final
- El complejo Black Mesa
- El diseño de los enemigos y su comportamiento
- El final es impresionante
- ¡EL MAGNUM!
- El traje HEV
- Ese rollo a ''apocalipsis zombi'' que tiene a veces...
- Es un Shooter de supervivencia, la salud escasea, emboscadas...
- Fue una revolución
- G-Man... más misterioso imposible
- La ambientación esta muy bien conseguida
- La historia, original y muy bien narrada
- La IA es sorprendentemente buena
- ¡LA PALANCA!
- La parte de las oficinas, es mi preferida
- La revisión gráfica es buena
- No sabes lo que está pasando, todo es muy misterioso
- Te enfrentas a los aliens y al ''ejército'' a la vez
- Totalmente en español, aunque el doblaje no sea de lo mejor...

[h1] No me gusta [/h1]

- Algunos enemigos son muy molestos y dan ganas de...
- A veces no sabes ni qué te ha matado
- Bugs que pueden dejarte ''atrapado'' y sin poder continuar
- Ciertas incoherencias, proyectiles que atraviesan muros...
- El control es... muy raro, ''resbala''
- El doblaje
- El juego es antiguo, así que... MENTE ABIERTA
- Hay partes que vas a tener que repetir muuuchas veces
- Los ''ninjas''... ¿Eran necesarios?
- No es fácil, y si pierdes la paciencia... pues muy mal
- ¿Porqué los compañeros mueren SIEMPRE?

[h1] GRACIAS POR LEER MI ANÁLISIS, PUEDES VISITARME EN [/h1]

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzYUE6zCeylgVgMWYrA5rHA
Необыкновенная игра,в которую должен поиграть каждый.

O jogo é foda até hoje!
Se vc relevar os gráficos de 1998 vai se deparar com um excelente game. Difícil lembrar de um game recente tão bom quanto Half-Life!

小时候就玩过盗版的相关mod，那时候就是联机对着干，根本没玩过原作，说实话，估计那个时候玩原作不一定能玩的懂。
最近买了个大包玩了之后发现这个游戏虽然画面是比较蛋疼了一些，但是内容和剧情在当时，真心是神作，就连现在玩都有一种说不出来的震撼.

The graphics may be slightly improved and have ragdolls, but on someparts, I've had glitches with graphics and honestly, they're really aren't that many differences between this and the original, in terms of graphics. Get the original Half Life 1 for faster load times and less glitches.

If you are unfamiliar with Half-Life, it is an fps in which you play as a physicist who has to survive an alien incursion in an underground research facility. This is a port of the original Half-Life to the Source engine.

The gameplay is varied, containing combat, puzzle solving, and platforming. The story is interesting; however, the player must pay attention in order to get some of the more obscure plot points. There is plenty of enemy variety and a large number of weapons to use against them.

There are a few negatives: the platforming can require many attempts to get past certain sections and there is a large difficulty spike near the end.

The differences between Half-Life and Half-Life Source are improved water graphics and physics, the addition of ragdoll physics, better lighting, and 3D skyboxes.

Overall Iwould give this game a strong recomendation of 9/10
Who needs a social life when you have Half-Life?
пожалуй эта игра будет лучшим даже через 10 лет
趁着最近打折入了半条命大包 ，早就听说这个 系列充满传奇，玩起来果然名不虚传，那么多年前的游戏现在玩起来依然是游戏性不减，作为v社的代表作充满了v社风格，期待半条命3能够早日发布！！

Half life 2 but old

买了半条命大包之后犹豫着是通一遍半条命1还是通一遍半条命1起源...然后选择了起源...
9小时  从列车进黑山到被G-man封存  两天时间...（都高三的人了233    其中还不乏一些场景作死的反复尝试彩蛋......（单纯通关时间会更短

......

虽然半条命从5年多前到现在玩过很多次的，差不多每年都会找几天的时间来玩玩半条命系列，但如此完整畅快的一口气通关是第一次...（可能是随着年龄的增长，这次几乎没怎么卡关，毕竟当时特别迷半条命的时候大概是初一初二的样子

......

而不断玩游戏的目的就像是一场时间旅行一样...每一处机关设计，每一处场景，每一小段剧情，我都会慢慢琢磨......似乎自己能与16年前的游戏开发人员们达成一种意识上的交流和共识......这种感觉通过游戏，近在咫尺。

来说说半条命起源相比半条命1的变化吧 
1、加入了物理引擎，虽然物理引擎不能帮助你花式过关，但是让游戏增加了不少乐趣——比如  把陆战队用弩钉在墙上晃来晃去  用手雷把尸体炸飞起来......箱子和油桶推拉起来的手感趋近于半条命2  而且舒服很多
2、新增了半条命2里的音效......比如砸玻璃的声音，撬棍砸金属物品的声音...等等等等   半条命2前段时间刚通关了一次...导致了听到这些熟悉的打击声音甚至让我在误以为玩半条命2...   感觉挺奇妙的
3、武器手感变化，最直观的是mp5，感觉更真实了（虽然更不好用了，不过近战不错
4、手电筒的光发生变化，变为和半条命2里一样的圆形光源了...在管道里匍匐的时候，开着手电筒  真tmd像半条命2的感觉...毕竟是起源引擎
5、水面反射（在一大堆低分辨率贴图的游戏里居然发现了动态光影水面反射...这感觉就像是在公共厕所里久久徘徊隔个粪坑之时找到了一潭清澈见底的甘泉！   所以说啊  V社你为啥不把贴图下一点点心思呢...贴图方面是原原本本的移植了半条命1......
6、走路手感非常好了，可能和物理引擎有关，再也不会出现半条命1的滑步的现象了... （在列车和电梯运行中跳来跳去也不会发生物理学意外了23333

总的来说想要重温半条命1的玩家们，半条命起源绝对是最好的选择，完全忠于原作的还原，无BUG  增加了不少新乐趣，和小细节...还有...两架重置过后的F-16......

Побагоюзив, сократил две главы и дошел до On a rail. И больше не вернусь к этому никогда и ни за что. Лучше ещё раз пройду оригинал

This is basically Half-Life 1 except it's ported straight to the Source Engine; no graphics enhanced, nothing special.
There's nothing new here other than ragdolls are now in the game.
So far I saw scientists sitting on their chairs by their legs, not their rear and it's not going to get fixed anytime soon.
But what's the point? It's literally Half-Life except on the Source Engine.

You better off play the original Half Life (GoldScr Engine) or the actual port: Black Mesa.

One of the best FPS games I've ever played.

Level design is good. The strict hallways in the beginning, the more open areas in the middle and the alien world in the end are all nice to play. There are some more difficult sections in the game, but nothing you can't overcome with training and skill.

I like the weapons. My favourite is the crossbow that makes a funny noise when you launch it to obliterate someone's brains. The Xen weapons are also nice, but like in Halo, I prefer human technology.

Buy it. The updated Source version isn't even expensive.

Many more bugs, but for now, I'll uninstall this game, reinstall the original version.

I was thinking if I should do a new review for this game or just not even cover it, but I decided to review so here goes.

http://steamcommunity.com/id/snortcannon/recommended/70/ My original review of Half Life.

Half Life Source is the remastered (if you can call it that) version of the original Half Life. With less game breaking bugs and better textures.

At first when I started playing I didn't notice many different things as the game still looks a lot like the original Half Life. Apart from some different textures like the better models and water physics the game looks pretty much identical.

My biggest problem with the original version of Half Life was that the game was incredibly buggy. I encountered many game breaking bugs. This wasn't the case with Source. Apart from one chapter where I encountered texture pop ins, I didn't encounter much more.

In the end there's nothing more I can say about Half Life Source that I didn't say in my original review. It's a fantastic game and one of my favorite games to date. I highly suggest buying it if you haven't already and playing. 

Now which version do I recommend playing ? I suggest playing this instead of the original. But I do suggest getting the first one just for Opposing Force and Blue Shift. 

Final Rating:
8/10 - Worth Buying

If you liked this review please consider giving it a like and if you disliked post in the comments on what you disliked about the review. 

For more reviews follow Snort's Review curator page [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/snortsreviews#curation]here[/url] - follow for regular updates on reviews for other games!

Que tipo de jogo você seria capaz de fazer uma tatuagem? Que tipo de jogo te levaria a escrever história paralelas, desenhar sobre e comprar Action Figures? Este jogo é HALF-LIFE! Um clássico divisor de águas em todos os sentidos. Sem dúvidas é o meu jogo preferido...ontem, hoje e SEMPRE!

Half-Life was an amazing game back in 1998. It's one of the few games that I remember playing, [b]and[/b] completing during that time. I would recommend Half-Life to anyone who hasn't played it, but for those who have, it just doesn't hold up over time. It's just not the same as playing it back in the 90s. Then again, many things aren't.

This source version of the game, doesn't do anything for me. The graphics are better, but that makes the game... "less scary". There is way too much lighting. Areas that used to be dark, and spooky, are now brightly lit, and the emenies aren't scary at all, because the newly done models, just don't have the same effect as the older, darker models.

I remember nearly running from the room when the game originally came out, because it was just too scary. The new graphics, and brightly lit models, just put me to sleep.

I find this source edition to be even less interesting, because it gives you instant access to every level in the game. So there is no challenge anymore. There is no reason to play the game from the start (there is no reason to save), because you can just pick any level you want, and start there. That might be fun for some people, but as soon as I saw that was an option, I was instantly turned off. Sure, this is an [b]option[/b], and you don't [b]have[/b] to play it that way, but just due to the fact that the levels are all open, is a turn off for me.

If you're looking for this game, because you think it's going to take you back to the 90s... Don't be surprised when it doesn't have that same effect.

Steam should offer Black Mesa as compensation for those of us who mistakenly purchased this game thinking it would look, play, feel and sound newer than the original, which we also paid for. 
One of the biggest rip-offs since the debacle of Postal 3. 
Sorely disappointed, but we know Steam doesn't give a hoot as long as the money keeps flowing.
I strongly recommend gamers wait for Black Mesa to be fully bug-free completed (with Xen chapters) and stay well clear of this. 
I award Half Life: Source minus 100 stars.
Buy Back Mesa and save 10 Euro...

Whoops bought the wrong game shitt....

I genuinely can't f**king believe it, Half Life killed the first person shooter genre and rebuilt it from the ground up, but better.

The graphics in this are stunning for '97, and further improved with the added Source engine, especially the water, it is remarkably reflective! 
Now, for the part of the game everyone loves, the weapons, oh the weapons, you have the basic assault rifle, pistol and shotgun, but then you also have more unique methods of attack, such as sending out little snark bug things to fight for you, setting trip mines on the floors and walls, a laser-guided rocket launcher, and two weapons that use plutonium.

The NPCs can be a little janky at times, but for the most part, they're still really damn good!
Well, occasionally, them dying can lead to hilarity-inducing results, much like Garry's Mod, where if you use the physics gun to put a ragdoll through the ground, it'll, as young me put it, "spaz the crud out", however, for the most part, it's still immerses you in the game.

The story of the game, which I won't spoil here, is something to be awe'd at, it's a typical science fiction story, except with a twist, the military are involved for a cleanup operation, then when they're all tangled up, Black-ops are sent in.

The ending of the game, after the boss fight is, as the G-man says, "Quite an anticlimax for what you've just survived."

P.S, it's got an 8 foot tall armored spider with a huge testicle so 10/10 game

[h1]The black sheep of the Half-Life series[/h1]

First of all, Half-Life is a great game. Everyone knows that. I don't need to bother describing Half-Life's gameplay in any detail. Long story short, I loved the game then and I still do. Its influence on the industry is virtually unparalleled and indirectly led to the creation of Steam in the first place!

However, Half-Life: Source is a disappointment with a misleading title. I say "misleading" because having already played Counter-Strike: Source and Day of Defeat: Source, I expected this game to be a full HD remake of the original, with proper models and textures. Instead, all we got was the original 1998 models and textures running on the Source engine. We didn't even get the polygonal upgrades that Half-Life Blue Shift received. Sure, the physics and lighting are modern, but it's hard to notice when everything else is blocky and jagged. It makes this game seem pointless especially when the original 1998 game is still available and has a much larger community. 

It's such a shame - I'm sure this game would've made a killing selling at full price if it were a proper HD remake. At least I didn't directly pay for this game - I got it as part of a much larger bundle.

Fortunately, not all is lost. The Black Mesa: Source mod (which I've played) has done what Valve failed to do - remake the campaign with proper HD graphics. Either play that game, or stick to the original 1998 game. Don't waste money buying Half-Life: Source standalone.

Great game, way ahead of it's time and it still holds up today perhaps not graphically but definitely is strong gameplay wise and that is what's most important in a video game. It's a rollercoaster of gameplay where it constantly switches between run & gun shoot 'em up, survival horror, and puzzle platformer. It starts of strong with and immersive experience and the best intro for a video game in my personal opinion. But I have to note that the last missions in Xen are the weakest missions in the game and a painfuly difficult boss fight with an ending not worth the struggle at the end, the ending leaves you asking more question than you did at the begining of the game but the Half-Life series is known for that. But overall it's a great game and a must own, it's just the Xen missions and ending that are slightly dissapointing. I would give it an 8.5/10

Do not expect much, it's the same Half-Life we all know and love with some minor improvements. But any excuse is good to play it through again right?

As "Good" a this remake sounds, its still just the original Half-Life reworked in source minus the excellent graphics of source. Now im not saying that this game is bad but i am saying that its inferior to the original thats available on steam. The reason I say that is because unlike Half-life Half-Life:Source does not include  HD mode. (HD mode is basically the original HD Pack included with the release of Blueshift that made the NPCs and Weapons look considerably better) So the only real advantage that Half-Life: Source has over the original is a more stable engine (Not to say theres anything wrong with gold source engine) that gets rid of the few glitches the original had. So in the end Half-Life: Source really isnt that much of an improvement over the original. 10/10 for being Half-Life. 5/10 for being an "improvement". P.S. I actually think the graphics are too blurry -my personal opinion.

Half-Life ist ein Klassiker, keine Frage. Auch heute spiele ich es noch mindestens einmal im Jahr durch. Dementsprechend aufgeregt war ich damals, als es hieß, es käme eine neue Version auf Basis der Source-Engine. Ernüchternd war dann das Ergebnis: Anstatt dem von vielen Fans erhofften HD-Remake in dem Stil, was heute mit 
[url=store.steampowered.com/app/362890]Black Mesa[/url] spielbar ist, war HL Source leider nur ein Port auf die damals neue Source Engine mit nur wenigen Verbesserungen - vielmehr sogar vielen Verschlechterungen, meiner Meinung nach, denn es wurden u.a. auch Effekte aus Half-Life 2 wie das Wasser oder die zerbrechenden Glasscheiben übernommen, das Ragdoll wirkt seltsam und am schlimmsten: Teilweise auch Soundeffekte, was meiner Meinung nach ziemlich die Atmosphäre und das Feeling des Ur-Half-Lifes stört. Wenn ich jahrelang eben dieses Spiel gewohnt war, wirken diese Sachen einfach deplaziert und seltsam.

Ich persönlich bleibe lieber beim Original, oder wenn ich Lust auf die Source-Version habe: Black Mesa.
Gra nie różni się od oryginału niczym, oprócz silnika source. Wszystkie modele są takie same. Już lepiej kupić tańszą wersję GoldSrc, która jest dużo lepsza.
Just Like Origanal Half-Life just with somewhat better graphics, more  realistic physics.

Das ERSTE Half-Life in ( etwas ) besserer Grafik und OHNE eine DEUTSCHE version !!!

Mein lieblings game ;) 

Bitte ... sei kein idiot der bei Grafik ab-spritzt ;) es ist sehr toll ^^
Just buy it

Seeing as I have restarted the game 3 times, and reinstalled once and still bug-stuck on the first level I cannot rate this up.

I title of this age, on this platform, made by valve... should be flawless. This is pathetic. 

I regret the time I spent downloading what should have been a great experience, as advertised. Will attempt the classic version, in hopes the full collection wasnt a waste of space.

El juego está cabrón pero es satisfactorio acabartelo. Es raro jugarlo y acabarlo por primera vez en el 2015, no me acostumbraba mucho al sistema de juego, pero en fin, recomendado. (Compra el paquete completo de Half Life cuando esté en oferta)
its AWSOME!!!
I like this game cause it brings out  the childhood memories and its fun with the scientists and security guards going crazy and stuff.
Это просто напроста half-life 1 только на движке 2-ой части, геймплей в общем то остается тем-же, много софта для гарисмода, вспомнить и понастольгировать можно, в общем 10/10
I reccomend this game if you have a mouse that works with this game. I didn't. So... yeah again I wasted my money on an unplayable game on Steam. Thank you Lord Gaben.

Muito Pica esse jogo,é a primeira vez que eu jogo Half Life e digo que é espetacular , O Gráfico não me importa muito e e sim O enredo  que é muito bom e meio que te deixa preso e  ansioso  para continuar jogando até terminar o jogo,eu Recomendo! e Muito. 10/10
Would have been more fun for it's time.
Nedotknuty prvy Half-Life s mierne vylepsenym vizualom pohanany Source enginom vyvinutym pre Half-Life 2, ktorym bol nahradeny povodny GoldSrc engine.

Useable Gmod content, Nicer water and physics, ragdolls the ability to shoot things and kill them even during a scripted event, better dev console. If you dont own it, get Half Life:Source. Its not as bad as people say and idk why Valve is ashamed of it. Has some bugs from steampipe update though. 
Get the original half life too, its two different experiances.
This game is basically HL1 but ported to source(with a few hilarious glitches). If you want a REMAKE,you should go for Black Mesa.

o bom e velho half-life com a água realista vale a pena ter guardado na coleção.
